metadata.description: AI-powered developer assistants for code auditing, research, and multi-model consultation

plugins.name: code-auditor

plugins.name: code-quality-auditor
plugins.description: Fast post-implementation quality checks for recently modified files

plugins.name: research-assistant
plugins.description: Research libraries, frameworks, and APIs using official documentation
